title: LIBERTARIANISM 4 The Nature Of Change
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary: In the finale I continue the story of liberalism vs libertarianism into the middle of the twentieth century.  We explore the Keynes vs Hayek debate, the formulation of the modern welfare state and the 1945 general election.  The finale also covers the different battlegrounds of ideological competition and ends by arguing for a particular understanding of what political change is and how it is possible.
itunes:subtitle: In the finale I continue the story of liberalism â€¦
